list.li1: You can use a smartphone, tablet or camera. Or you can use a scanner connected to a computer.
list.li2: Make sure your fit note is landscape (horizontal) not portrait (vertical).
list.li3: The whole fit note must be shown. It needs to be on 1 A4 page.
list.li4: Check that the image is in focus and all the text can be read.

insetText.li1: the selected file must be a JPG, BMP, PNG, TIF or PDF.
insetText.li2: the selected file must be smaller than 10MB.
insetText.li3: ensure all 4 corners of the fit note are included

missing: You must select a file to continue
invalid: The selected file must be a JPG, JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIF or PDF
failed-ocr: The selected file must be clear and readable, containing the whole fit note
tooBig: The selected file must be smaller than 10MB
